Package controller

Class MastermindController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MastermindController
  • public class MastermindController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is serves as the controller for the MVC (Mode/Control/View). This class creates a MastermindController object that performs task with the player's guesses. This class can check if the player's guess matches the solution. It can also return statistics about the plyer's guess like the number of letters that are right colors that are in the right places and number of letters that are the right colors but are in the wrong places.
    Author:
    Peter Vo

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getRightColorRightPlace​(java.lang.String guess)
      This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it counts and returns the number of letters that are the right color in the right places
      int getRightColorWrongPlace​(java.lang.String guess)
      This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it counts and returns the number of letters that are the right colors but are in the wrong places
      boolean isCorrect​(java.lang.String guess)
      This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it returns true if the guess matches the solution and false if it doesn't

    • Method Detail

      • isCorrect

        public boolean isCorrect​(java.lang.String guess)
                  throws MastermindIllegalLengthException,
                         MastermindIllegalColorException
        This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it returns true if the guess matches the solution and false if it doesn't
        Parameters:
        guess - The player's guess that is a string
        Returns:
        true if the guess matches the solution and false if it doesn't
        Throws:
        MastermindIllegalColorException - when user's guess contain invalid color(s)
        MastermindIllegalLengthException - when user's guess is not 4 letter long

      • getRightColorRightPlace

        public int getRightColorRightPlace​(java.lang.String guess)
                            throws MastermindIllegalLengthException,
                                   MastermindIllegalColorException
        This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it counts and returns the number of letters that are the right color in the right places
        Parameters:
        guess - The player's guess that is a string
        Returns:
        the number of letters that are the right color and in the right places
        Throws:
        MastermindIllegalColorException - when user's guess contain invalid color(s)
        MastermindIllegalLengthException - when user's guess is not 4 letter long
